Action Instructions*: Purpose . This process step shows you how to generate a billing document and credit the customerâ€™s account. . Procedure .
Log on to the SAP Fiori launchpad as a Billing Clerk.

.Choose  Billing Setting  in the bottom bar. ..You can make the following settings as below: Set billing date and type before billing:  Create separate billing document for each item of billing due list: OFF Automatically Post Billing Documents: ON Display Billing Document After Creation:  ON

Action Instructions*: .Choose billing type Credit Memo (G2) and maintain billing date, for example,  current date .Choose OK
